page.title: 12Services in Dean
page.content: The villages of Upper and Lower Dean come under North Bedfordshire Council, whereas Tilbrook is in Cambridgeshire, so although few miles separate the two, there is little link between them . For example the Bedfordshire Mobile Library visits Dean fortnightly, with 3 different stops, whereas Tilbrook is served by Cambridgeshire Library. The villages are also served by newspaper deliveries, postal services twice daily, a mobile shop from the local shop in Upper Dean, fish and chips and greengrocery shops call in the village also. The Bedfordshire Rural Community Council's mobile information van known as BRIAN also calls fortnightly. This holds information on jobs available in the area and other useful information. The van is manned by an unemployed volunteer.
